about_the_game: Awaken, Tenno, and open your ears to the sounds of the Origin System. Digital Extremes has worked to capture the ear-pulsing sounds of Warframe — featuring a full remaster of 24 incredible tracks from the game’s score.
detailed_description:
CREDITS

Music production & supervision: George Spanos
Music production & supervision on Ave Luscinia, Final Stand, & Riders of The Void: George Spanos & Erich Preston

Soundtrack production: George Spanos
Soundtrack managers: Julia Fields, Danish Hassan, Anna Leah Ponce
Soundtrack mastering: Noah Mintz at Lacquer Channel Mastering

Compositions by: Keith Power, George Spanos, Matthew Chalmers, Alan Doyle, Evan Duffy, Jason Graves, Steve Davis, Todd Haberman, Kenny Wood, John Carey
Lyrics: Keith Power, Adrian Bott, Alan Doyle

Featuring performances by: Keith Power, George Spanos, Kate Offer, Kenny Wood, Todd Haberman, Ro Rowan, Jason Graves, Matthew Chalmers, Steve Davis, Tori Letzler, Romano DiNillo, Greg Hawco, Aaron Collis, The Ennis Sisters, Michelle Doyle, Alan Doyle, Henry Doyle, Damhnait Doyle, Kevin Durand, Murray Foster, Jason Lewis, John Carey

Warframe (Official Soundtrack II) art: Ken Taylor
Soundtrack art direction: Eric Vedder, Gabriel do Valle, Robbie Perchaluk

Digital Extremes creative direction: Steve Sinclair & Rebecca Ford

Special thanks to the team at Digital Extremes


About the Game

Awaken, Tenno, and open your ears to the sounds of the Origin System. Digital Extremes has worked to capture the ear-pulsing sounds of Warframe — featuring a full remaster of 24 incredible tracks from the game’s score.
legal_notice: Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd.
name: Warframe Official Soundtrack I

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 183 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 769 MB available space

short_description: Whether you’re on Earth or Europa, Saturn or Sedna, you’ll recognize the energetic and rhythm-heavy soundscapes of Warframe captured here.
